reviewText:
This DVD features a talented teacher presenting clear instructions in a calming and reasonable tone. As with any new yoga, there will be some brief difficulties at first - for example, sometimes you won't be able to see the teacher because the pose requires you to be looking elsewhere. The difficulties are minimal in this presentation.

I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because there is background noise at times in the presentation, and because the teacher isn't credited.

Why isn't the teacher credited??
It was very kind DVD. It was the English that I who was a foreigner was easy to understand. Because it is very simple YOGA, it is for beginners. I am happy.
